dsOverview.title: Global temperature and salinity climatology, by Bauer and Robinson.

summary.p: Historical data archives from NUC and NODC were combined to form monthly and annual grid of subsurface ocean temperature and salinity.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
